009package Ch15_Color_Filters;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
015import imagingbook.common.filter.nonlinear.ScalarMedianFilter;
016import imagingbook.common.filter.nonlinear.ScalarMedianFilter.Parameters;
017import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
018import imagingbook.core.jdoc.JavaDocHelp;
019import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
020
021import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
022
023
024/**
025 * <p>This plugin applies a scalar median filter to all three planes of a RGB color image. See Sec. 15.2.1 of [1] for
026 * details.
027 * </p>
028 * <p>
029 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer
030 * (2022).
031 * </p>
032 *
033 * @author WB
034 * @version 2022/12/10
035 */
036public class MedianFilter_Scalar implements PlugInFilter, JavaDocHelp {
037
038        private static final Parameters params = new Parameters();
039        static {
040                params.radius = 3;
041        }
042
043        /**
044         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image is currently open.
045         */
046        public MedianFilter_Scalar() {
047                if (noCurrentImage()) {
048                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.ColorTest3);
049                }
050        }
051        
052    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
053        return DOES_RGB;
054    }
055
056    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
057        if (!runDialog())
058                return;
059        ScalarMedianFilter filter = new ScalarMedianFilter(params);
060        filter.applyTo(ip);     // apply destructively
061    }
062    
063    private boolean runDialog() {
064                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
065                gd.addHelp(getJavaDocUrl());
066                gd.addNumericField("Filter radius", params.radius, 1);
067                gd.showDialog();
068
069                if (gd.wasCanceled())
070                        return false;
071
072                params.radius = Math.max(gd.getNextNumber(), 1);
073                return true;
074    }
075
076}
077
